headline: Base Carbon Announces Shareholder Meeting Results
summary: TORONTO, Feb. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Base Carbon Inc. (Cboe CA: BCBN) (OTCQX: BCBNF) with operations through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Base Carbon Capital Partners Corp. (together, with affiliates, “Base Carbon”, or the “Company”), is pleased to announce the results of its Special Shareholder Meeting (the “Meeting”). Shareholders voted in favour of appointing BDO Canada LLP, as auditors of the Company for the 2025 fiscal year and authorized the directors to fix their remuneration: # of

headline: CBOE: Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Stocks to Watch Friday: Amazon, Roblox, Stellantis, Strategy
summary: ↘️ Amazon (AMZN): The online retailer and cloud-computing company plans $200 billion in capital spending this year, as it ramps up investment in artificial intelligence. Shares sank 7% premarket. ↘️ Stellantis (IT:STLAM), (STLA): The Jeep maker will book charges of about $26 billion as it scales back a push into electric vehicles.

headline: Did Cboe’s (CBOE) Move Into Regulated Event Options Just Shift Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Cboe Global Markets has outlined plans to relaunch regulated “all-or-nothing” options and enter the event-driven prediction markets arena, while also announcing senior leadership changes and record January trading volumes across key products. This move positions Cboe to apply its exchange infrastructure and regulatory oversight to a newer class of simplified, outcome-based derivatives competing with specialized prediction platforms. We’ll now examine how Cboe’s push into regulated...
